meanings.sent1: The bailors waited anxiously outside the courtroom.
meanings.sent2: The judge asked the bailors to step forward.
meanings.sent3: The bailors joked about starting a bail-giving business.
meanings.sent4: The bailors were like guardian angels for their friends in trouble.
meanings.sent5: The bailors' act of kindness will always be remembered by the defendant.

meanings.definition: A person who delivers goods in trust to another.
meanings.sent1: The bailors handed over the valuable package to the recipient.
meanings.sent2: The bailors entrusted the goods to the warehouse manager.
meanings.sent3: The bailors accidentally delivered the wrong package to the customer.
meanings.sent4: The bailors were like reliable messengers ensuring safe delivery.
meanings.sent5: The bailors' responsibility was to ensure the safekeeping of the goods.
